txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have another task for you. Return to me at the Scholar's Stair, and perhaps we can tear your head from the clouds and put it where it belongs...in study.

Dalton Willow
'Excellent, you came, and quickly. I was afraid that you would choose to chase another fancy. Well then, listen closely, for this is important.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Dalton Willow in Bree
Dalton Willow sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Dalton Willow. He can be found at the Scholar's Stair in Bree.
